hero.title: About Our Company
hero.subtitle: Learn about our mission, values, and the team behind our success.

story.title: Our Story
content: Founded in 2020, our company has grown from a small startup to a leader in the industry. We believe in innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction.
Our team consists of talented professionals who are passionate about creating exceptional products and services that make a difference in people's lives.

values.title: What We Stand For
values.subtitle:
Our core values guide everything we do
and shape our company culture.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: Constantly pushing boundaries and exploring new ideas.

items.title: Quality
items.description: Delivering excellence in everything we create.

items.title: Integrity
items.description: Being honest, transparent, and ethical in all our actions.

items.title: Collaboration
items.description: Working together to achieve common goals.
